cards.title: Submitting ...
cards.subtitle: Connecting to server to submit vote ...

cards.title: Cassie's Spotify:
cards.question: [EN] Alright, alright, DJ CASSIE CAS with the aux cord, trying to get something popping with 3 banging tracks. What we listening to, fam? Say your piece, now. [FR] OK, DJ CASSIE CAS aux platines qui chauffe l'ambiance avec 3 morceaux qui déchirent. On écoute quoi, la mifa ? Faites votre choix.
options: Aye!!!!  This and no other. / Chanmé! Ça et rien d'autre.

cards.title: Doms's Decision:
cards.question: [EN] What to do, what to do... Your boy, Dom, has got a dilemma on his hands - sit with T-Money Tarquin and Hugo, or continue gaming with his A one from day one, Jayda. [FR] Que faire ? Ton garçon, Dom, a un dilemme : s'asseoir avec T-Money Tarquin et Hugo, ou continuer de jouer avec sa meilleure pote, Jayda.
options: Are you kidding me, it's gotta be with his bestie, Jayda. / Tu plaisantes, il doit rester avec sa BFF, Jayda.
Nah, for real for real, T-Money's got bars, so of course we're sitting with him and Hugo. / Non, T-Money rappe comme un Dieu, alors on s'assoit avec Hugo et lui.

cards.title: Darren's Dilemma:
cards.question: [EN] Oh dear, Darren's got a dilemma on his hands, doesn't he? What is he to do? [FR] Darren a un dilemme. Que doit-il faire?
options: Yes, let Cassie off the bus immediately. / Il doit laisser Cassie descendre du bus.
No, Cassie stays on the bus like everyone else. / Cassie doit rester dans le bus comme tout le monde

cards.title: Afsaneh's Dilemma:
cards.question: [EN] Yikes, this is not good.  Can Afsaneh get Sepideh to shut up and save her? [FR] Ça ne sent pas bon. Est-ce qu'Afsaneh peut faire taire Sepideh et la sauver?
options: Definitely.  Our girl's got the skills. / Carrément. Elle en est capable.
Absolutely not.  No way.  Uh-uh. / C'est impossible.

cards.title: Decision Time:
cards.question: [EN] Ash is gonna get stabbed either way, and someone's gotta do it.  So, who will it be? [FR] Ash va se faire poignarder, et quelqu’un doit le faire. Qui s’en charge?
